name: Alien Abduction Dizzy
description:
A Dizzy fangame made in about 2000 ish. Dizzy has been abducted by aliens and must find a way to escape. Controls:  z and x to move left and right, space to jump, enter to collect item and right control to drop or use an item. Controls are like that to be like the dizzy controls on the spectrum tho you didn't press control to drop on there I couldn't figure out how to have enter be used for both pickup and drop/use in The Games Factory.

Many more Dizzy fangames are available at www.yolkfolk.com
